page.title: 02Milton Ernest Lower School
page.content: This Victorian{village school}was built in 1871. It has a junior room and porch, with office/utility room, cloakroom and toilets. There is a play area, learner swimming pool, mobile infant room and playing field. There are 33 children aged from 4+ to 8+ years taught by the{Headmaster}and an {Assistant Teacher.}Ancillary staff is secretarial and custodial. English, mathematics, science, geography, history, religion, music, art and craft, pottery, movement, computer work, swimming and maypole and country dancing are taught. The{Village {Hall}is used for Physical Education and at lunchtime when 22 pupils take a school meal and 11 a packed lunch. The school day is from 0900h_1530h. Easter Christmas, Maytime and Harvest Festivals are celebrated annually.
